summary: When his estranged father returns, a hairdresser is forced to quit performing at the local drag club.
cast: Luis Alberto García|Héctor Medina|Jorge Martínez|Luis Manuel Alvarez|Renata Maikel Machin Blanco|Laura Alemán|Paula Ali|Luis Angel Batista Bruzón|Luis Daniel Ventura Garbendia|Maikol Villa Puey|Oscar Ibarra Napoles|Jorge Perugorría|Libia Batista|Tomás Cao|Jorge Eduardo Acosta Ordonez|Mark O'Halloran|Rayma Pérez|Carlos Enrique Riverón Rodríguez|Niruka Castellón|Carlos Calero Díaz|Karla M. Venereo|Anyeli Constanten|Josie Breathnach
title: Viva
